titleStmt.title: A letter to Mr. Thomas Pierce, rector of Brington conteining amongst other things, a brief state of the question about Gods decrees : to which is annexed an exercitation in Latine concerning free-will / by Edward Bagshawe ...
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
